Job Description: We require Automation test engineer (Python preferrably) with following skillsets:  To do this job, you need to have basic fundamentals of Computer, Software Engineering, Operating Systems and Networking.     In addition, you should have, good knowledge of Linux basic commands, set up Linux/Solaris machines and working in Linux editors.    You should have good understanding of OOPS concept.   Automation / DevOps skills Python Automation preferably, Java , Java Selenium or any other programming language along with DevOps tools:Jenkins GIT  Knowledge upon any cloud platform Google Cloud, MS Azure,AWS    Nice to Have Performance or Load Testing experience    You must be fluent in English.   We would like someone to join our team who is detail oriented and a result driven individual with good communication skills and a problem solving attitude, can also adapt to changes.   You must have a BE/B. Tech/ M. Tech/MCA of Equivalent degree.   We are looking for someone with 3+ years of experience in testing using relevant skills.
